concept.title: Processing Available Data
concept.shortdesc: When you start a pipeline for the first time, the MapR Streams Consumer becomes a new consumer group for the topic. It reads only incoming data, processing data from all partitions, and ignores any existing data in the topic by default.

conbody.p: MapR Streams Consumer originprocessing all dataTo read all unread data in the topic, add the auto.offset.reset Kafka configuration property. Set the property to smallest for versions before . Set it to earliest for and later. For more information about this property, see the Apache Kafka documentation.
